scripts.services:restart: npm run services:stop && npm run services:start
scripts.nimbus:start: docker start nimbus-rpc || docker run -d --name nimbus-rpc -p 8545:8545 -v nimbus-data:/data statusim/nimbus-eth1:latest --http-enabled --http-address=0.0.0.0 --http-port=8545 --network=sepolia
scripts.deploy:ipfs: npm run build && fleek sites deploy
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules/.cache && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:all: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules logs .pids
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm install && cd frontend && npm install
